text: The Pentax Optio E60 is a digital compact camera announced by Pentax on July 31, 2008. It uses AA batteries and therefore does not depend on a proprietary charger.http://www.dpreview.com/articles/7232404750/pentaxe60 ==References== *http://www.dpreview.com/products/pentax/compacts/pentax_optioe60/specifications Category:Pentax cameras Category:Cameras introduced in 2008
title: Pentax Optio E60
